title: Share of dietary energy supply from carbohydrates vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: The share of per capita dietary energy derived from carbohydrates, measured as the daily caloric supply from carbohydrates as a percentage of total caloric supply, versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita measured in constant international-$.

display.name: Share of dietary energy from carbohydrates

sourceDesc: OWID based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations; Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
